intro.title:
Dear friends and family, 
 This page is made for you to share love in this moment of loss. This space is intimate, so please feel free to share your photos and moments lived with {{firstname, capitalize}}. Only together can we hope to overcome this loss. 
All our love, {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family.

share.message:
Hello,

It is with a heavy heart that we must share the news of {{fullname}}'s death.

We have created an intimate page where we can support each other and pay homage to {{fullname}}'s memory.

Your words of support and your memories will light our path as we traverse through darkness.

By going on the page, you can: 

- View information regarding planned memorial services
- Share your condolences, a memory or photos with us 

We've thought of you but have certainly forgotten others who have loved and now lost. Please share this page with anyone that comes to mind.

Thank you, infinitely.

Feel free to access the page here: {{uri.page}}
